mapper.select: SELECT LocalName, FaseName, BusinessNumber, Address, BusinessPaper, MasterName, MasterEmail, Phone, MasterPhone, JoinDate, Royalty, VANName, VANNum, FranchiseeNum, MasterPassword, FranchiseeStatus FROM FranchiseeInfo

SELECT MCode, Name, Num, Status, ID, Password, LastVisit, Point, replace( convert( VARCHAR, convert( MONEY, Point ), 1 ), '.00', '' ) cPoint, DisNum, QRCode, Phone, Birth, Adult, AdultNum, ChildNum, JoinDate, Address, EntFlag, EntTime, ExtTime, EntNumber, Memo, Picture1, Picture2, Picture3, Picture4, Picture5, Withdraw, WithdrawDate, WithdrawMemo, FranchiseeNum, FranchiseeCode, EntFranchiseeCode, Coupon1, Coupon2, Coupon3, SpecialMan, AgreeFlag, TermsFlag, AgreeDate, Photo, CASE WHEN (SELECT LocalName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = MASTERINFO.FranchiseeNum) != '' THEN (SELECT LocalName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = MASTERINFO.FranchiseeNum) WHEN MASTERINFO.FranchiseeNum = '8888888' THEN '모바일' ELSE '슈퍼윙즈키즈카페' END AS fName, CASE WHEN (SELECT LocalName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = MASTERINFO.EntFranchiseeCode) != '' THEN (SELECT LocalName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = MASTERINFO.EntFranchiseeCode) ELSE '슈퍼윙즈키즈카페' END AS lastVisitFname FROM MASTERINFO WHERE MCode = #{mCode}

SELECT MCode, MFlag, Name, QRCode, Status, ID, Password, Phone, Birth, Adult, JoinDate, Address, EntFlag, EntTime, ExtTime, EntKindName, EntPrice, EntNumber, Memo, Picture1, Picture2, Picture3, Picture4, Picture5, Facility01, Facility02, Facility03, Facility04, Facility05, Facility06, Facility07, Facility08, Facility09, Facility10, Facility11, Facility12, Facility13, Facility14, Facility15, Facility16, Facility17, Facility18, Facility19, Facility20, EntFranchiseCode, FranchiseeNum, FranchiseeCode, LastVisit, own FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE Phone = #{phone}

SELECT TOP 3 InDate, CONVERT (DATE, InDate) cIndate, FranchiseeNum, CASE WHEN (SELECT LocalName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = VisitInfo.FranchiseeNum) != '' THEN (SELECT LocalName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = VisitInfo.FranchiseeNum) ELSE '슈퍼윙즈키즈카페' END AS fName, replace( convert( VARCHAR, convert( MONEY, Price ), 1 ), '.00', '' ) cPrice, Price FROM VisitInfo WHERE MCode = #{mCode} ORDER BY InDate DESC

SELECT LEFT(INDATE, 8) INDATE, SUBSTRING(INDATE, 0, 5) + '년' + SUBSTRING(INDATE, 5, 2) + '월' + SUBSTRING(INDATE, 7, 2) + '일' YYYYMMDD, (SELECT LOCALNAME FROM FRANCHISEEINFO WHERE FRANCHISEEINFO.FRANCHISEENUM = GOODSSALEINFO.FRANCHISEENUM) LOCAL_NAME, MCODE, NAME, CASE WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '0' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0' THEN '입장요금' WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '2' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0' THEN '퇴장요금' WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '1' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0' THEN '푸드판매' WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '1' AND GOODSKIND2 = '2' THEN '스낵' WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '3' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0' THEN 'MD상품' WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '1' AND GOODSKIND2 = '1' THEN '커피/음료' WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '0' AND GOODSKIND2 = '6' THEN '직권할인 내역' WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '0' AND GOODSKIND2 = '3' THEN '입장시 할인내역' WHEN GOODSKIND1 = '7' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0' THEN '다회권' ELSE '기타' END AS KINDS_OF_SALES, PRICE, REPLACE( CONVERT( VARCHAR, CONVERT( MONEY, PRICE ), 1 ), '.00', '' ) CPRICE, CASE WHEN CANCELFLAG = '0' THEN '승인' WHEN CANCELFLAG = '1' THEN '취소' WHEN CANCELFLAG = '2' THEN '직권취소' ELSE '기타' END AS CONFIRM_TYPE, (SELECT CASE WHEN APPROVALKIND = '0' THEN '현금' WHEN APPROVALKIND = '1' THEN '신용카드' ELSE '기타' END FROM PAYMENTINFO WHERE PAYMENTINFO.APPROVALNUM = GOODSSALEINFO.APPROVALNUM) KINDS_OF_PAY, APPROVALNUM, QRCODE, GOODSNAME, CASE WHEN NAME = '비회원' THEN '비회원카드' ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN ISNULL(A.RS14,'0') = '0' THEN '현금' WHEN ISNULL(A.RS14,'0') != '0' THEN A.RS14 ELSE '기타' END FROM CARDOKDATAINFO A WHERE CONTACTNUM != '' AND A.CANCEL = '0' AND A.CONTACTNUM = GOODSSALEINFO.CONTACTNUM AND A.ENTNUMBER = GOODSSALEINFO.ENTNUMBER) END AS PG_NAME FROM GOODSSALEINFO WHERE MCode = #{mCode} AND ( GOODSKIND1 = '0' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0' OR GOODSKIND1 = '1' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0' OR GOODSKIND1 = '1' AND GOODSKIND2 = '2' OR GOODSKIND1 = '3' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0' OR GOODSKIND1 = '1' AND GOODSKIND2 = '1' OR GOODSKIND1 = '7' AND GOODSKIND2 = '0')

SELECT USERNAME, MCODE, NAME, LEFT(DATETIME, 8) INDATE, (SELECT LOCALNAME FROM FRANCHISEEINFO WHERE FRANCHISEEINFO.FRANCHISEENUM = MULTITICKETSALESUSE.FRANCHISEENUM) LOCAL_NAME, BUYUSE, MKINDCODE, NUM, BALANCE, LASTFLAG, RESERVED1, RESERVED2, RESERVED3 FROM MULTITICKETSALESUSE WHERE MCODE = #{mCode}
